backend/main.mo: Main actor handling access control, blob storage, user profiles, projects, templates, and query/mutation APIs with structured project types.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading old project records to include new published and isShared fields while preserving user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend application files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, theme provider, error boundary, and routing between dashboard and landing page.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/CreatorD: Dashboard layout managing navigation, preview canvas, and context-specific control panels with mobile/desktop variants.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/SidebarN: Sidebar navigation component listing sections including the new Creations/Templates area.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/TopBar.t: Top bar component handling project loading, saving, and user logout with settings serialization.
frontend/src/features/audio/AnalysisStat: UI panel for adjusting audio analysis sensitivity and frequency multipliers.
frontend/src/features/audio/AudioEditing: Provides trim and fade controls for loaded audio using sliders.
frontend/src/features/audio/AudioUploadP: Handles audio file upload, displays file info, and offers play/pause controls.
frontend/src/features/audio/useAudioEngi: Zustand store managing audio loading, playback, trimming, fades, and analysis setup.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Gates content behind Internet Identity authentication with login handling.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupM: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/features/background/Backgro: UI for configuring background type, colors, gradients, images, and particle settings.
frontend/src/features/background/backgro: Canvas rendering helpers for solid, gradient, and image-based backgrounds.
frontend/src/features/background/particl: Implements a particle overlay that initializes, animates, and renders particles on a canvas with adjustable density and intensity.
frontend/src/features/background/useBack: Defines a Zustand store managing background settings including colors, gradients, images, and particle options with serialization support.
frontend/src/features/errors/ErrorBounda: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI with error details and a refresh button when a rendering error occurs.
frontend/src/features/export/exportEstim: Provides functions to estimate export file size and render time based on resolution, FPS, bitrate, and duration.
frontend/src/features/export/ExportPanel: UI panel for configuring video export settings and displaying estimated output, currently showing a placeholder notice for upcoming export functionality.
frontend/src/features/export/exportRende: Captures canvas frames and renders a sequence of frames over time for video export purposes.
frontend/src/features/export/ffmpeg/ffmp: Placeholder FFmpeg client simulating load and progress but throwing an error since real FFmpeg.wasm support is unavailable.
frontend/src/features/export/useExportQu: Zustand store managing a queue of export jobs with enqueue, update, cancel, and removal operations.
frontend/src/features/gallery/CreationsT: UI panel that displays templates and published creations, allowing users to create projects from templates.
frontend/src/features/gallery/formatters: Utility functions for truncating principal IDs and formatting BPM values for display.
frontend/src/features/overlays/overlayRe: Canvas rendering helpers that draw text, logos, and watermarks based on overlay settings and animation state.
frontend/src/features/overlays/OverlaysC: UI panel for editing overlay text, branding, logo, and animation settings using useOverlaySettings.
frontend/src/features/overlays/useOverla: Zustand store managing overlay text, font, position, animation, logo, and serialization/deserialization.
frontend/src/features/persistence/applyL: Applies project data by deserializing background, overlay, and visualizer settings into their respective stores.
frontend/src/features/persistence/projec: Encodes frontend JSON strings into backend-ready background, branding, and tunnel settings structures.
frontend/src/features/preview/PreviewCan: Canvas component that initializes the visualizer engine and displays a preview area.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectsP: Project management UI for creating, selecting, publishing, and listing projects.
frontend/src/features/projects/useCurren: Zustand store tracking and updating the currently selected project ID.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/B: Renders a horizontal bar equalizer with 64 bars whose heights and colors reflect audio data.
Renders a vertical bar equalizer with centered bars sized based on audio intensity.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/C: Draws a circular radial spectrum of bars around a center point based on audio frequencies.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/M: Creates a soft glow and minimal waveform driven by the average audio amplitude.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/P: Generates reactive moving particles whose position, size, and color depend on audio data.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/R: Renders multiple neon-colored radial rings of audio-reactive dots.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/T: Implements a WebGL animated tunnel effect using shaders with optional audio input.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/W: Draws a simple waveform line across the canvas using normalized audio samples.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/useVisu: Provides React/Zustand store and hooks to initialize and control the VisualizerEngine.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/Visuali: UI panel for selecting visualizer modes with WebGL support warnings and mode validation.
Manages canvas-based audio visualizers, switching modes, handling analyzers, animation loops, and WebGL tunnel mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and projects via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable setup defining light/dark themes and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorDashboard.tsx: Creator dashboard wrapper with auth gating, profile setup, and main layout.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero, features, and login via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing WaveCraft Pro goals, features, architecture notes, and versions.
